meanings.definition: The quality of being convincing or persuasive.
meanings.sent1: Her convincingnesses in the debate won over many voters.
meanings.sent2: The convincingnesses of the evidence left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: His convincingnesses in getting out of chores always amazes me.
meanings.sent4: The convincingnesses of her arguments were like a powerful magnet.
meanings.sent5: The convincingnesses of his speech echoed in the minds of the audience.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being convincing or believable.
meanings.sent1: The convincingnesses of the story made it hard to put down.
meanings.sent2: His convincingnesses in negotiations always led to successful deals.
meanings.sent3: The convincingnesses of the excuse made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The convincingnesses of the painting transported viewers to another world.
meanings.sent5: The convincingnesses of the actor's performance left the audience in awe.
